best_practices: Include main keyword near the start

recommendations.too_short: Title is too short. Add more descriptive content while keeping under 60 characters.
recommendations.too_long: Title exceeds 60 characters. Shorten it to prevent truncation in search results.
recommendations.missing: Missing title tag. Add a descriptive title that includes your main keyword.

recommendations.too_short: Description is too short. Aim for 150-160 characters to maximize SERP real estate.
recommendations.too_long: Description exceeds 160 characters. Shorten it to prevent truncation.
recommendations.missing: Missing meta description. Add a compelling description with a call-to-action.
Missing viewport meta tag. Add it to ensure proper mobile rendering.
recommendations.incomplete: Viewport tag present but missing key parameters. Update for better mobile optimization.

recommendations.missing: No H1 tag found. Add a primary heading that describes your page content.
recommendations.multiple: Multiple H1 tags found. Use only one H1 per page.
recommendations.too_long: H1 is too long. Keep it concise while including your main keyword.

recommendations.poor_hierarchy: Improve heading structure. Use H2-H6 to create clear content hierarchy.
recommendations.missing_subheadings: Add more subheadings to break up content and improve readability.

recommendations.missing: Missing canonical tag. Add it to prevent duplicate content issues.
recommendations.incorrect: Canonical tag present but may be incorrect. Verify it points to the preferred version.

recommendations.missing: Missing favicon. Add one to improve brand recognition and user experience.
recommendations.low_quality: Favicon present but low quality. Consider updating for better appearance.
